title: So if I do not have cell phone or internet service, how can I play something from my phone to TV?
content: If you do not have internet or cell phone service, how is it possible to connect your Pixel 3 to a TV if they are not permitting the use of the USB C to HDMI? I think google not permitting those actions is the dumbest thing ever. I have chromecasts I use at my home but at the mountain house I go to it would be nice if I could play my downloaded movies on the TV through a USB C to HDMI.
